actor-start.eventDescription: Flat fee for starting an Actor run.

tomtom-geocode.eventDescription: Price for converting an address to coordinates.

tomtom-reverse-geocode.eventTitle: Price for TomTom Reverse Geocode request
tomtom-reverse-geocode.eventDescription: Price for getting an address from GPS coordinates.

tomtom-fuzzy-search.eventTitle: Price for TomTom Fuzzy Search request
tomtom-fuzzy-search.eventDescription: Price for an intelligent search with typo tolerance.

tomtom-poi-search.eventTitle: Price for TomTom POI Search request
tomtom-poi-search.eventDescription: Price for finding specific business categories.

tomtom-nearby.eventTitle: Price for TomTom Nearby Search request
tomtom-nearby.eventDescription: Price for discovering services within a radius.

tomtom-routing.eventDescription: Price for calculating optimal routes between locations.

tomtom-waypoint-routing.eventTitle: Price for TomTom Waypoint Routing request

tomtom-reachable-range.eventTitle: Price for TomTom Reachable Range request
tomtom-reachable-range.eventDescription: Price for determining coverage areas by time/distance.

tomtom-traffic.eventDescription: Price for getting real-time incidents data.

tomtom-static-map.eventTitle: Price for TomTom Static Map request
tomtom-static-map.eventDescription: Price for generating custom map images.
